title: BUS - RE-ESTABLISH BUS On Test Environment

task_list.instruction_title:
To check before
    select *
    from bus.subscription s
    where s.desc_subscription like '%BankIntegration%check%';
Dans SQL Developer Run SQL script  -> Reintegration-SECLI-ATLAS-Pour-Env-Secondaire.sql + COMMIT
Run script (sur la machine BUS) /bus/iib/bin/iib_db_tables_subs_make.sh all
To check after, in SQL Developer Run SQL Command :
    select s.*, rowid
    from bus.subscription s
    where s.name_table_subs = 'secli'
    and s.flag_enabled = 1
    and s.id_channel not in
    ('out.email.reply', 'out.bus.error_mngmt', 'out.null_subscriber')
    and s.id_channel not like 'out.nhost%'
    order by s.id_topic;
